Step 1: frame wall in an empty space

Step 1: half of a log wall
30 cm x 1 m x 4 m wall, 3 parts of soil (558 L), 2 parts of sand (372 L), 1 part of gravel (186 L), 7% of cement/quicklime (84 L), and then water is added as 10% of total mass of a wall (120 kg)
Fairly time consuming as you have to extrude the resin slowly and wait for it to dry, then layer it on itself
Step 2: complete the half made wall
